articles.author: Anushree Gupta
articles.title: How are coronavirus symptoms of infection with new COVID strain different from initial signs of COVID-19? - Times Now
articles.description: No research or reports have proven a change in the symptoms associated with COVID-19 – whether the infection is caused due to the previous strain, or the new strain. However, the new strain is more contagious.
articles.content:
